objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#C41E1E;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#F05E23;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='triangle-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD54F;stop-opacity:0.3'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF8F00;stop-opacity:0.5'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg-gradient)'/><path d='M0,0 L400,0 L0,400 Z' fill='#000000' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M1080,1080 L680,1080 L1080,680 Z' fill='#000000' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M850,0 L1080,0 L1080,230 Z' fill='url(#triangle-gradient)'/><path d='M0,850 L0,1080 L230,1080 Z' fill='url(#triangle-gradient)'/><polygon points='540,150 640,320 440,320' fill='#FFD54F' opacity='0.1'/><polygon points='840,600 940,770 740,770' fill='#FFD54F' opacity='0.4'/><polygon points='200,500 300,670 100,670' fill='#FFD54F' opacity='0.2'/><rect x='50' y='50' width='980' height='980' rx='20' fill='none' stroke='rgba(255,255,255,0.3)' stroke-width='5'/></svg>

objects.text:
Pack of 64 snack-size bags Classic
crunch & bold flavor Perfect for parties
Savory three-cheese blend

product_details.description: Product Description          The chip that packs a flavorful punch with the classic crunch. Boldly seasoned with three cheeses, tomatoes, onions and a savory blend of spices. Indulge yourself or share with large gatherings.             Manufacturer Contact Information          Plano, Tx 75024-4099 Pack of 64, 1.75 ounce large single serving bags (total of 112 ounces) Doritos tortilla chips with classic nacho cheese flavor Made of whole corn; flavorings feature real cheddar cheese Crunchy straight from the bag or after scooping up dip or salsa Ships in Certified Frustration Free Packaging Brand - Doritos ** Flavor - Nacho Cheese ** Unit Count - 1 Count ** Number of Items - 64 ** Type - Tortilla Chip **

banner_details:
The banner features a dynamic, bold design with a strong retail marketing appeal. The background is a diagonal gradient transitioning from deep red to bright orange, decorated with translucent geometric triangular elements that add visual depth. The center-left is dominated by a large, high-impact heading ("heading") in a playful, bold white font, conveying energy and emphasis. Just beneath is a striking subheading ("subheading") in a golden yellow hue, followed by a horizontal white decorative divider ("decorative_divider"). Supporting subtext ("description") provides key product highlights in smaller, compact white font. On the bottom left, the product price ("price") is prominently displayed in large white text, paired with a yellow call-to-action (CTA) button ("cta_background") containing black uppercase text ("cta"). The right side visually balances the text with a high-resolution product image ("product_image") of a red snack package. The layout is neatly enclosed in a semi-transparent white-bordered frame.

**Color Palette:**
- Bold Red: #C41E1E
- Bright Orange: #F05E23
- Golden Yellow: #FFD54F
- White: #FFFFFF
- Black (CTA text): #000000
product_color: The Doritos Nacho Cheese product image features a bold and energetic color palette that is ideal for designing a high-impact advertisement banner. The dominant red background (#C22121) creates a sense of intensity and excitement, while gradients of darker crimson and highlights of orange add dimension and motion. The Doritos logo uses a dynamic mix of black (#000000), white (#FFFFFF), and orange-yellow (#FFB800), drawing attention with sharp contrast. The chips themselves feature warm golden hues (#F7A623) with toasted brown specks, emphasizing flavor and crispiness. The strong color blending ensures each element stands out while maintaining visual harmony, enhancing the snack’s appeal.
